page.title: 05HOME LIFE. A SCHOOLBOY'S DAY
page.content: Ten years old. Up at seven o'clock every school day.I dress in school uniform.Breakfast is two slices of toast and a glass of apple juice.Dad drives me to school at eight o'clock. First lesson is swimming at Ross baths.Back for breaktime.I play in the yard or on the field when it is fine. Next is a lesson on our trip to London.Twelve o'clock I eat my sandwich lunch in the class with my friends.More lessons follow involving Maths,English,French,Geography,History Science,Music or P.E.Home by bus and car.Once homework is done I can play or watch T.V.
